name: Greenfield Market
description: A bustling marketplace featuring organic produce, local dairy, and handmade farm goods.

name: AgroTech Training Center
description: Empowering farmers with digital and mechanical farming techniques for increased yield.

name: Sunny Harvest Farms
description: A family-run farm offering farm tours and seasonal fruit picking events.

name: AgriTown Cooperative
description: Supporting smallholder farmers with access to loans, seeds, and technical advice.

name: Farmers' Innovation Hub
description: A center for agri-entrepreneurs to connect, learn, and develop agricultural startups.

name: AgriTown Farmers Day
description: A community event where farmers showcase products directly to consumers every Saturday.

name: AgriTown Eco Garden
description: A sustainable garden demonstrating eco-friendly farming and composting methods.

name: Harvest Museum
description: Preserving the history of agriculture, tools, and innovations across generations.
